All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    Bishop
    Bishop piece class represents a Bishop piece on board
    Board
    Board class is responsible for chessboard backend mechanics.
    BoardController
    The BoardController class is responsible for interacting with logic board
    BoardDrawUtilsView
    The BoardDrawUtilsView is responsible for grid cells
    BotController
    The BotController class is responsible for AI.
    Cell
    Cell enum class represents signe cell on chess board (64 in total 8x8)
    FiguresDrawView
    The FiguresDrawView is responsible for drawing and erasing figures on UI
    Game
    Main class where game starts.
    GameController  
    King
    King piece class
    Knight
    Knight piece class
    MainGameView
    The MainGameView is responsible for invoking other Views
    Move
    Move class provides information about type of move, moved piece, killed piece and start, end cords.
    MoveType  
    Pawn
    Pawn piece class
    Piece
    Piece abstract class represents information about single piece on board.
    PieceController
    The PieceController is responsible for dragging Pieces on chessboard.
    Queen
    Queen piece class
    Rook
    Rook piece class
    SaveController  
    Test  
    TimerController
    The TimerController is responsible for timer going and presenting time.
